items.title: Foul play not suspected as actor Gene Hackman, wife and dog found dead, sheriff says
items.description: The couple was found during a welfare check after their neighbor called in concerned about their well-being.

items.title: Woman caught trying to plant explosive devices at Tesla dealership
items.description: A woman in Colorado has been arrested after police caught her with explosives at a Tesla dealership, police said.

items.title: WATCH:  Horse rescued from icy pond in upstate New York
items.description: A horse that fell through the ice of an upstate New York pond was saved by rescuers who pulled together to free the animal from the frigid water.

items.title: WATCH:  Foul play not suspected as actor Gene Hackman, wife and dog found dead

items.title: US support 'crucial,' Zelenskyy says amid mineral deal negotiations
items.description: Ukraine is "preparing for negotiations" with the U.S. regarding security guarantees and "crucial" aid, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said.
